page.title: List of tools to create Live USB systems

revisions.rev:
{{External links|date=August 2010}} {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ List of tools to create [[Live USB]] systems |- ! Name of the tool ! Runs from... ! Installs... ! Comments |- ! [http://hacktolive.org/wiki/Cd2usb cd2usb] | windows | designed to make Live USBs of Ubuntu (also Super OS) |"cd2usb by hacktolive" (formerly "ULUMFW") |- ! [[DasBoot]] | [[Mac OS X]] | [[Mac OS X]] | |- ! [[dd (Unix)|dd]] | Unix and Linux | any image | |- ! [http://packages.debian.org/lenny/live-magic Debian live-magic] | [[Debian]] | [[Debian]] | Can create various image types (CD, USB, netboot, webboot) |- ! [[Fedora Live USB creator]] | Windows and Linux | [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]] | |- ! [http://www.knopper.net/knoppix/knoppix-flash-en.html flash-knoppix] | [[Knoppix]] DVD | [[Knoppix]] | |- ! [http://aligunduz.org/FUSBi/ FUSBi
= Free USB Installer] | Linux and Windows | * the FSF-endorsed Free Software GNU/Linux Distributions * general support for any .iso | based on [[UNetbootin]] |- ! [http://h20000.www2.hp.com/bizsupport/TechSupport/SoftwareDescription.jsp?swItem=MTX-UNITY-I23839 HP Drive Key Boot Utility ] | Windows | * utility to create bootable USB sticks * latest version: 7.41.3790.0 (8 Nov 2005) | one of the earliest tools [http://h20000.www2.hp.com/bizsupport/TechSupport/SoftwareDescription.jsp?lang=en&cc=us&prodTypeId=18964&prodSeriesId=1146658&swItem=MTX-UNITY-I21478&prodNameId=1135772&swEnvOID=181&swLang=8&taskId=135&mode=5 Version: 7.10 (6 Aug 2004)] |- ! [[LinuxLive USB Creator]] | Windows | * [http://www.linuxliveusb.com/en/supported-linuxes many] * general support for any .iso | |- ! [http://live.learnfree.eu LiveUSB Install] | Linux, Windows | * [http://live.learnfree.eu/support many] * general support for any .iso, .img etc. (via [[dd (Unix)|dd]]) | * Initially developed by SKSS for [http://learnfree.eu USU Linux] * offers optional data persistence for Ubuntu and Debian-based distributions |- ! [https://launchpad.net/bouilloncube make-live-device.sh] | [[puredyne]] | [[puredyne]] | [http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Puredyne/Creating_a_live_USB_stick wiki instructions] |- ! [http://www2.mandriva.com/downloads/?p=seed Mandriva Seed] | Linux and Windows | [[Mandriva One]] | |- ! [http://liveusb.info/dotclear/ MultiSystem, LiveUSB MultiBoot.] | Linux | [http://liveusb.info/dotclear/index.php?pages/os many] | |- ! [[Windows To Go|Portable Workspace Creator]] | [[Windows 8]] | [[Windows 8]] | Not yet released |- ! [http://rudd-o.com/new-projects/portablelinux Portable Linux] | Linux | any distribution that uses Casper as its LiveCD technology | offers data persistence |- ! [http://www.sarducd.it/ SARDU
(Shardana Antivirus Rescue Disk Utility)] | Windows | Comprehensive collections of antivirus rescue cds, collections of utilities, popular distributions of Linux Live, the best known Windows PE Â© , recovery disks and Install of Windows XP Â© and Windows Seven Â© | Build MultiBoot USB and CD/DVD. |- ! [[SliTaz|SliTaz TazUSB]] | Linux | [[SliTaz]] | offers data persistance and rollback |- ! [[SUSE Studio ImageWriter]] | Linux and Windows | * [[SUSE Studio]] and [[SUSE Linux distributions]] * any hybrid .iso | offers data persistence |- ! [[Ubuntu Live USB creator]] | Linux | [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] | |- ! [[UNetbootin]] | Windows, Linux, and Mac OS X | * [http://unetbootin.sourceforge.net/#features can automatically download 37 distros and supports many others] * general support for any .iso | * The resulting installation will function just as it does from a CD. * Offers data persistence |- ! [http://www.pendrivelinux.com/ Universal USB Installer (PendriveLinux.com)] | Windows | * [http://www.pendrivelinux.com/yumi-multiboot-usb-creator/ multi-boot iso/squashfs manager (add/remove)] * [http://www.pendrivelinux.com/universal-usb-installer-easy-as-1-2-3/ single-boot, maybe with persistence ] | * generic iso options * iso download option | |- ! [https://launchpad.net/win32-image-writer Win32 Disk Imager
= Image Writer for Windows] | Windows | any disk image | recommended by [[Arch Linux]] and [[Moblin]] |- !
